original: 勸韓遂與西涼軍閥共，起兵反曹，十萬人馬進逼潼關。唯受賈詡離間計，大敗逃亡；間接導致馬騰等家人被誅...
text: Persuaded Han Sui to join forces with the Xiliang warlords to rise up against Cao, and one hundred thousand people marched into Tongguan. Only by Jia Xu's divorce, he was defeated and fled; indirectly caused Ma Teng and his family to be sentenced...
